duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and Implement MCG’s global Enterprise Resource Management (ERM) system in cooperation with the ERM team in the Americas and other regions.
Direct and manage the overall ERM operations in the region, coordinating various General Affairs activities and office administration and procedures.
Establish, implement, and maintain ERM systems and procedures for global risk management system access.
Maintain an effective relationship with compliance, supply chain, and digital units to cover global risk profiles.
Ensure alignment of all businesses with the ERM process and integrate all departments into one risk management system.
Hold Regional ERM Committee meetings and conduct risk communication and monitoring throughout the region.
Collect and analyze ERM information on a global and regional basis, keeping close communication with the ERM department in the headquarters office.
Implement and operate crisis and emergency control processes in the regions, and develop office policies and standards to guide office operation.
Support business and functional activities based on overall business needs, priorities, and initiatives, and manage financial and headcount budgets for general affairs activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business or related field. MBA degree a plus.
